name: Paradise Waterfall

trigger.text: K.O. up to 1 of your opponent's rested Characters with a cost of 4 or less.

text: [Counter] Your Leader or up to 1 of your Characters gains +2000 power during this battle. Then, set up to 1 of your Characters as active.

effect.text: Your Leader or up to 1 of your Characters gains +2000 power during this battle. Then, set up to 1 of your Characters as active.
